Body:
Description: Currently, the system log only displays 200 entries, even when set to show 500 entries (including Logs Report and others). It seems that there is no relevant setting in Default System Settings. How can this be adjusted?

To prevent MS Office PST files from being taken out, we selected OUTLOOK under CAP Policy > File Type > Office Files. However, users receive frequent alerts every time they run Outlook. Besides setting Client Mode to Silent, do you have any other recommendations?

Under Denylists > Applications, we can specify the application name, and Parameters allow additional configurations. Theoretically, using parameters, we should be able to block file transfers in WhatsApp while still allowing conversations. Is this correct?

If (3) is correct, do you have parameters to prevent file transfers in Teams, LINE, WeChat, and WhatsApp?

What We've Learned Updated: - let the customer know how to view more entires, how to turn off policy notifications and how to select apps in CAP policies
-
Next Steps Updated: waiting on further questions
What We've Learned Updated: - let the customer know how to view more entires, how to turn off policy notifications and how to select apps in CAP policies

@Botond Biro​ - Automatic Follow-Up has been disabled because it does not work with the “System Account for Website.” Please update the ticket with the correct customer account (ask the Partner for the actual customer name if necessary) before re-enabling Automatic Follow-Up.
